about.title: About Dr. Danielo Torres
about.text: Dedicated to delivering world-class surgical excellence...

intro.headline: Excellence in Surgery. Passion in Care.
intro.subtext: Internationally recognized expert in plastic and orthopedic surgery.

about.title: About Dr. Danielo Torres
about.text1: Dr. Danielo Torres is a world-renowned Plastic and Orthopedic Surgeon, celebrated for his precision, innovation, and holistic patient care. With an elite international presence, Dr. Torres has transformed lives across Portugal, Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
about.text2: Passionate about both aesthetic harmony and physical function, he combines deep surgical expertise with state-of-the-art technologies. Each procedure is tailored to reflect not just anatomical accuracy, but personal confidence and beauty.
about.text3: His global career, enriched by countless successful procedures and satisfied patients, is grounded in excellence, empathy, and continual medical evolution.
